name: Harmony
description: Harmony is a hybrid that synchronizes the very best of its three parent strains, Santa Marta Colombian Gold, LemonÂ OG Kush, and Lemon Thai. These tall plants produce flowery, lemon-smelling buds distinctly kush-like in structure. Its effects are invigorating and uplifting, but higher doses might push you into a more spacey experience. Indoor growers wait 8 to 9 weeks for Harmony to flower while outdoor cultivators prepare for harvest in the month of October.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Relaxed, Creative, Happy, Euphoric, Stress, Pain, Depression, Fatigue, Lack of Appetite, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Dry Eyes
